籤詩版本二:
Ukudityaniswa kwe-yin kunye ne-yang kusoloko kumiselwa lizulu.Xa umfazi etshata nendoda, ngumtshato owonwabileyo.
Kodwa ukubona inamba kunye nenyoka idibana, u-Xiong Zhen ungena kwi-orchestra yamaphupha kwaye waphinda wadibana.
詩意:
Le hexagram imele indibaniselwano yeYin kunye neYang kunye neDao.
Yonke into ihamba kakuhle.
解曰: Landlela intliziyo yakho. Umtshato nokukhulelwa. Ubutyebi obunenzuzo. Iluncedo ngakumbi kwimibungu yesilika.
籤詩故事一:
◇Li Dan kunye nenamba kunye nephoenix bayasebenzisana
U-Li Dan waba nguRuizong we-Tang Dynasty, uWu Zetian wenyuka etroneni, kwaye umlawuli wehliswa waba ngumntu oqhelekileyo kwaye wahlala emaphandleni.Wadibana noHu Fengjiao waza watshata. Ngokwentsomi, bobabini babenesiqingatha setywina esisikweri esithatyathwe kwibhanti yomntwana.Emva kokugqithisa “itywina lokulwa” bangqina ukuba banokuba banye baza baba yindoda nomfazi.
(Inamba ibhekisa kuRuizong, kwaye iphoenix ibhekisa kuHu Fengjiao. Kuthetha ukuba umtshato umiselwa lizulu.)
聖意: Ukhuseleko lwasekhaya, ukuzicingela, ubutyebi, ishishini, umtshato, Liujia, amadoda ahamba ngeenyawo emasimini, iintshulube zesilika zichumile, izilwanyana zichumile, zikhangela abantu, izimangalo ziyathetheleleka, ukufuduka kuyaphumelela, izinto ezilahlekileyo zifunyenwe, izifo zidibana, okulungileyo. amayeza afunyenwe, iintaba kunye namangcwaba ngamathamsanqa
古人: ULi Dan dragon kunye nentsebenziswano phoenix
